short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your productivity in Google Analytics 4 with the classic Ctrl + C shortcut for effortless copying.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing CtrlC for GA4, the essential Chrome extension for Google Analytics 4 users. Say goodbye to the frustration of restricted copying actions. With CtrlC for GA4, you can easily copy text and data within Google Analytics 4 using the familiar Ctrl + C shortcut, streamlining your workflow and boosting your productivity.
